question: At age 20, this tennis player, partly of Haitian ancestry, beat Serena Williams in the 2018 U.S. Open. As of 2020, she is the highest paid female athlete in the world. She is the first Japanese-born tennis player to ever win a Grand Slam.
source: NAQT You Gotta Know These Tennis Players

question: From 1993 to 2000, this tennis player's only loss at Wimbledon was in 1996 to unranked player Mark Philippoussis. At the age of 19, this tennis player became the youngest man to ever win the U.S. Open, which he did in 1990.
source: NAQT You Gotta Know These Tennis Players
